entity.name: Riff.CC
entity.description:
Riff.CC is building software
    for publishing content libraries that are
    decentralised, sustainable and censorship
    resistant.

projects.name: Flagship
projects.description:
Flagship is the
      frontend for Riff.CC Lenses - a vibrant media
      streaming platform for the world.

plans.name:
Development
        costs and overall project costs
plans.description:
Our current spend on
        OpenCollective is approximately $125,000 a
        year as of July 2025.
